replies.msg:
漫畫Xmen世界觀同人物同復仇者有得比，只係電影衰本身冇任何規劃，亂咁嚟，導致情節人物犯駁
first class 後重新鋪過，有系統咁連番好，跟番漫畫。就算天啓唔掂，幾套啲大佬都唔算一次用完反派，係有壓逼感。
非罵戰，舉少少例，睇番復仇者1，除咗洛基有魅力，最後係歡樂地打完，比hulk 撻
復仇者二奥創比hulk 打飛

大戰點都要加埋啲笑位
ironman 1，2，美隊二三就拍得好
ironman 3亂改滿大人變成丑角
avg快銀就咁死


我諗avg 3先真係拍到英雄既悲慘大戰，咩叫真係強者

quote.msg:
There are thousands of men on those ships. Good, honest, innocent men! They're just following orders.

Erik Lehnsherr: I've been at the mercy of men just following orders.
Fox 都係一時時, 睇套F4 reboot真係"出色"

其實 X men 真係唔啱而家個 MCU
比左 FOX 可能係好事

漫畫Xmen世界觀同人物同復仇者有得比，只係電影衰本身冇任何規劃，亂咁嚟，導致情節人物犯駁
first class 後重新鋪過，有系統咁連番好，跟番漫畫。就算天啓唔掂，幾套啲大佬都唔算一次用完反派，係有壓逼感。
非罵戰，舉少少例，睇番復仇者1，除咗洛基有魅力，最後係歡樂地打完，比hulk 撻
復仇者二奥創比hulk 打飛

大戰點都要加埋啲笑位
ironman 1，2，美隊二三就拍得好
ironman 3亂改滿大人變成丑角
avg快銀就咁死


我諗avg 3先真係拍到英雄既悲慘大戰，咩叫真係強者

replies.msg:
成日見人叫fox比番marvel 但其實xmen根本一啲都唔夾mcu
係第三集同外傳出事姐 generally都好睇
其實唔明點解x1 x2 dofp xma都係同一個導演 xma可以拍到咁

兩個Charles見面嗰度

Charles: Is this what becomes of us? Erik was right. Humanity does this to us.

Pro X: Not if we show them a better path.

Charles: You still believe?

ProX: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever. Sometimes, we all need a little help.

Charles: I'm not the man I was. I open my mind up and it almost overwhelms me.

Pro X: You're afraid. And Cerebro knows it.

Charles: All those voices... so much PAIN

Pro X: It's not their pain you're afraid of. It's yours, Charles. And as frightening as it can be, that pain will make you stronger. If you allow yourself to feel it, embrace it, .it will make you more powerful than you ever imagined. It's the greatest gift we have: to bear their pain without breaking. And it comes from the most human part of us: hope. Charles, we need you to hope again.

quote.msg:
兩個Charles見面嗰度

Charles: Is this what becomes of us? Erik was right. Humanity does this to us.

Pro X: Not if we show them a better path.

Charles: You still believe?

ProX: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever. Sometimes, we all need a little help.

Charles: I'm not the man I was. I open my mind up and it almost overwhelms me.

Pro X: You're afraid. And Cerebro knows it.

Charles: All those voices... so much PAIN

Pro X: It's not their pain you're afraid of. It's yours, Charles. And as frightening as it can be, that pain will make you stronger. If you allow yourself to feel it, embrace it, .it will make you more powerful than you ever imagined. It's the greatest gift we have: to bear their pain without breaking. And it comes from the most human part of us: hope. Charles, we need you to hope again.
